definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: DBCC检查数据库数据完整性。

sentences.english: The associated hashing algorithm is used for providing integrity services.
sentences.chinese: 相关联的散列算法用来提供完整性服务。

sentences.english: The non-complete characteristics of the test wave as well as the wave reset of the given signal are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了检测波形的非完整性以及给定信号的波形设定。

sentences.english: To help hairstylists preserve, improve and enhance the integrity of the hair.
sentences.chinese: 为了帮助发型师维护，改善和提高头发的完整性。

sentences.english: Gross crystalline imperfections like twinning are apparent to the unaided eye .
sentences.chinese: 粗的晶体不完整性，如孪生体可用肉眼看出。

sentences.english: Signal integrity analysis of high-speed digital circuit;
sentences.chinese: 在高速数字电路中，信号完整性问题至关重要。

sentences.english: The integrity of the posterior retinaculum was examined intraoperatively in every patient during the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 每位患者在术中均检查后侧支持带的完整性。

sentences.english: This table uses referential integrity constraints to ensure data validity.
sentences.chinese: 这个表使用引用完整性约束确保数据的有效性。

sentences.english: Men need to be motivated and have their pelvic floor neurologically intact.
sentences.chinese: 这些患者需要运动以保持其骨盆神经的完整性。

sentences.english: They occur when there is a breakdown in the integrity of the corneal epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 该情况发生于角膜上皮的完整性受到破坏时。

sentences.english: Digital signatures and hash algorithms are mechanisms used to provide data integrity.
sentences.chinese: 数据签名和哈希算法是用于提供数据完整性的机制。

sentences.english: The transversal muscle fibre was not cut off, so the integrality of bladder neck was keeped.
sentences.chinese: 术中不切断膀胱颈横行肌纤维，保持其完整性。

sentences.english: The transport service ensures reliable delivery and transactional integrity.
sentences.chinese: 传输服务可确保可靠交付和事务完整性。

sentences.english: The smallest mistake can undermine the integrity of an entire system.
sentences.chinese: 最小的错误也可能破坏整个系统的完整性。

sentences.english: The realization of the inconsistence of the situation model can bring forward new hypotheses.
sentences.chinese: 意识到模型的不完整性可以触发新的假设。

sentences.english: Completeness and correctness are the key advantages to these methods.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些方法，完整性和正确性是关键。

definition: to keep/to retain/to have reservations (about sth)/to hold back (from saying sth)/to put aside for later
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
